item.name: wooden_arrow
item.description: You see a wooden arrow. With a supply of arrows in one hand and a bow in the other you can attack from a distance.

item.name: steel_arrow
item.description: You see a shining steel arrow. With plenty of these, and a good bow, you'll be a formidable archer.

item.name: golden_arrow
item.description: You see a golden arrow. With a fist full of these and a good bow, you will surely take down your enemies quicker.

item.name: power_arrow
item.description: You see a power arrow. The sting of this arrow will surely defeat your enemies, when equipped with a bow

item.name: dress
item.description: You see a dress, which provides practically no defence. It is barely worth picking up.

item.name: leather_armor
item.description: You see a worn suit of leather armor. It will provide only minimal protection.

item.name: leather_cuirass
item.description: You see a leather cuirass, well made but still able to be pierced by sharp swords.

item.name: leather_scale_armor
item.description: You see a suit of leather scale armor. The leather is toughened somehow for better protection.

item.name: pauldroned_leather_cuirass
item.description: You see a pauldroned leather cuirass. It was crafted to withstand minor attacks.

item.name: studded_armor
item.description: You see a suit of studded armor. Some studs are loose or rusty but it is still fit for purpose.

item.name: chain_armor
item.description: You see a suit of chain armor. Perhaps even if you don't need it, you can sell it.

item.name: enhanced_chainmail
item.description: You see a robust suit of enhanced chainmail. The links are closely spaced so even the sharpest point should not pierce it.

item.name: scale_armor
item.description: You see a suit of scale armor. It is not flexible like chain, but will be a better defense.

item.name: iron_scale_armor
item.description: You see a suit of iron scale armor, whose rounded scales will protect you from many blows.

item.name: golden_chainmail
item.description: You see a valuable suit of golden chainmail. It is crafted from fine links of expensive metal.

item.name: pauldroned_iron_cuirass
item.description: You see a formidable pauldroned iron cuirass. The pauldrons (shoulder pieces) will protect your upper half.

item.name: plate_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. You imagine it would be heavy but the steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong.

item.name: elvish_armor
item.description: You see a suit of elvish armor. It's made from tree leaves! But somehow constructed to give strong defence.

item.name: barbarian_armor
item.description: You see a suit of barbarian armor. It's dirty and smelly, but still, rather strong.

item.name: golden_armor
item.description: You see a suit of golden armor. It's made from the best materials with great attention to detail.

item.name: shadow_armor
item.description: You see a suit of shadow armor. It's hard to decide with what it is made, it is so dark.

item.name: dwarvish_armor
item.description: You see a dwarvish armor. It's made with ingenuity and skill.

item.name: stone_armor
item.description: You see a suit of stone armor. Swords will crumble if they try to pierce it.

item.name: ice_armor
item.description: You see a suit of ice armor, to protect even the coldest of hearts.

item.name: chaos_armor
item.description: You see a suit of chaos armor. The reflecting contrasting colours make no sense to you.

item.name: magic_plate_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. The steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong. It has been magically enhanced.

item.name: black_armor
item.description: You see a suit of black armor. Does it put you in a dark mood?

item.name: old_scythe
item.description: You see an old scythe, it used to be weapon of death. But now it is only a useful tool for farming.

item.name: small_axe
item.description: You see a small axe. It appears well made but you suspect it is too light to do much damage.

item.name: hand_axe
item.description: You see a hand axe, well worn from years of use but may prove useful.

item.name: axe
item.description: You see a rusty but heavy axe. What it lacks in sharpness it makes up for in weight.

item.name: battle_axe
item.description: You see a battle axe. It is well crafted and sharp despite its age.

item.name: scythe
item.description: You see the weapon of death - a scythe. It looks dangerous but perhaps also a useful tool for farming.

item.name: twoside_axe
item.description: You see a well crafted twoside axe.

item.name: bardiche
item.description: You see a rare and powerful bardiche.

item.name: golden_twoside_axe
item.description: You see a golden twoside axe. This axe is a rare find.

item.name: halberd
item.description: You see a rare halberd, with an axe's blade fused onto a shaft. It is both heavy and keen-edged.

item.name: magic_twoside_axe
item.description: You see a magic twoside axe. The nature of the magic isn't clear to you.

item.name: durin_axe
item.description: You see a durin axe, a great prize from the dwarves.

item.name: black_scythe
item.description: You see a black scythe. Its attack is awesome for a farming tool.

item.name: chaos_axe
item.description: You see a chaos axe. The handle is some alloy you can't recognise and the blade is golden coloured, but thinking too long about it makes you confused.

item.name: black_halberd
item.description: You see a black halberd. It's immensely heavy so will make huge blows but you can only swing it at a very slow rate.

item.name: book_black
item.description: You see the black book that Jynath kept out for so long.

item.name: leather_boots
item.description: You see a simple pair of leather boots to give your feet some protection.

item.name: studded_boots
item.description: You see a pair of worn studded boots with moderate protection for your feet.

item.name: chain_boots
item.description: You see a pair of chain boots, quite rusty but still strong.

item.name: steel_boots
item.description: You see a pair of steel boots, fit for any soldier.

item.name: elvish_boots
item.description: You see a pair of elvish boots.

item.name: golden_boots
item.description: You see a pair of golden boots. They will be heavy to wear but well worth their weight.

item.name: shadow_boots
item.description: You see a pair of shadow boots. You can't fathom what they are made of.

item.name: stone_boots
item.description: You see a pair of stone boots. They may be heavy, but they protect your feet well.

item.name: chaos_boots
item.description: You see a pair of chaos boots. Your steps are unsteady in them, but the extra defence they give is worth it.

item.name: green_thing_boots
item.description: You see a pair of green thing boots. They're slimy inside, ewwww.

item.name: black_boots
item.description: You stub your toe on this pair of black boots. Perhaps they bring you bad luck?

item.name: present
item.description: You see a christmas present. Open it.

item.name: basket
item.description: You see an easter basket. Look inside.

item.name: cloak
item.description: You see a simple cloth cloak.

item.name: elf_cloak
item.description: You see a white elf cloak. It doesn't look very warm.

item.name: dwarf_cloak
item.description: You see a dwarf cloak. Apparently this passes for fashion in some parts, but to you it looks more functional than fashionable.

item.name: elvish_cloak
item.description: You see an elvish cloak. The material is dark, but thick and warm.

item.name: blue_elf_cloak
item.description: You see a blue elf cloak. The material is thick and warm.

item.name: stone_cloak
item.description: You see a stone cloak. It's hard to tell how it was made, as the fibres look like narrow threads of mineral.

item.name: green_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a huge green dragon cloak. It's probably too big for you but, even dragging on the floor it will provide excellent protection.

item.name: bone_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a bone dragon cloak. It's incredibly old, like its last owner.

item.name: lich_cloak
item.description: You see a purple lich cloak. It's stained with blood - yours, from the previous undead owner, or perhaps the blood of his enemies...

item.name: vampire_cloak
item.description: You see a vibrant red vampire cloak. Wearing it sends a shiver down your spine.

item.name: shadow_cloak
item.description: You see a shadow cloak, in colours of the shadow armor.

item.name: blue_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a blue dragon cloak. The weave is tight and strong, though you wish the colour drew less attention.

item.name: black_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a torn section from an enormous black dragon cloak. You're very lucky: the piece is just the right size for a human to wear.

item.name: golden_cloak
item.description: You see a golden cloak. See how the light glistens off the gold, it is a prized possession.

item.name: chaos_cloak
item.description: You see a chaos cloak. The colours look like oil shimmering on a puddle.

item.name: black_cloak
item.description: You see a black cloak. The last owner had black thoughts. Will you?

item.name: club
item.description: You see a wooden club. It won't kill much but is better than no weapon.

item.name: staff
item.description: You see a staff. This is a seldom seen or used weapon.

item.name: mace
item.description: You see a mace, much neglected in years of use.

item.name: flail
item.description: You see a military flail. Swinging it in circles will tire you but it will be an effective weapon.

item.name: enhanced_mace
item.description: You see an enhanced mace. The heavy attacking end makes it hard to balance.

item.name: golden_mace
item.description: You see a shining golden mace. Despite looking ornamental, it is sharp enough to do some damage.

item.name: skull_staff
item.description: You see a rare skull staff. It appears mystical but will work like any other staff.

item.name: morning_star
item.description: You see a morning star. This is a very rare item indeed.

item.name: hammer
item.description: You see a common hammer. It is heavy enough that you should be able to bludgeon your enemies with it, but only slowly

item.name: golden_hammer
item.description: You see a valuable golden hammer. This golden weapon may be worth a lot to someone. It has a slow rate of attack.

item.name: war_hammer
item.description: You see a huge war hammer. It seems string but is so heavy that you can only lift it to attack every so often..

item.name: ice_war_hammer
item.description: You see a ice war hammer. The last owner must have been huge, to wield it.

item.name: chaos_hammer
item.description: You see a chaos hammer. It is a fearsome weapon.

item.name: ugmash
item.description: You see a huge ugmash. It can attack with a faster rate than many other clubs.

item.name: vulcano_hammer
item.description: You see a vulcano hammer. It's said to be a weapon of a God, but attacks with a snail like pace.

item.name: club_of_thorns
item.description: You see the club of thorns, The thorns are full with blood of tortured humans. It is hugely powerful but will drain your life to use it.

item.name: rod_of_the_gm
item.description: You see a rod of the GM. This rod is reserved for those with special powers, be careful not to let it fall into the wrong hands.

item.name: flask
item.description: You see a flask. This flask is good for storing medicine.

item.name: bottle
item.description: You see a bottle. It is empty, someone drank the contents

item.name: big_bottle
item.description: You see a big bottle.

item.name: empty_goblet
item.description: You see an empty goblet. You wonder what could it hold.

item.name: goblet
item.description: You see a goblet. You look at its contents, and shiver at the blood inside.

item.name: beer
item.description: You see a beer. On a hot summer day, it would taste great.

item.name: wine
item.description: You see a bottle of wine. It will quench your thirst.

item.name: antidote
item.description: You see an antidote, to cure you of poison and protect you for a while.

item.name: greater_antidote
item.description: You see a greater antidote, to cure you of poison and protect you for a long while.

item.name: poison
item.description: You see a bottle of poison. Don't drink it!

item.name: greater_poison
item.description: You see a greater poison. Don't drink it!

item.name: deadly_poison
item.description: You see a deadly poison. Don't drink it!

item.name: disease_poison
item.description: You see a disease poison. Be careful, it's wicked.

item.name: mega_poison
item.description: You see a mega poison. This is some wicked poison.

item.name: minor_potion
item.description: You see a minor potion. It's not much but may save you in a tight spot.

item.name: soup
item.description: You see a bowl of soup. Its contents fills you up.

item.name: potion
item.description: You see a potion. Take it to battle and you may survive longer.

item.name: greater_potion
item.description: You see a greater potion, invaluable in battle.

item.name: mega_potion
item.description: You see a mega potion. It strenghtens greatly.

item.name: cherry
item.description: You see a cherry. It tangy taste revives you a little.

item.name: cheese
item.description: You see some cheese. Eat it and see what happens.

item.name: carrot
item.description: You see a carrot. It can be an ingredient, or you can eat it.

item.name: salad
item.description: You see a salad.

item.name: apple
item.description: You see a nice shiny apple.

item.name: bread
item.description: You see a loaf of bread. It is freshly baked and ready to eat.

item.name: button_mushroom
item.description: You see a button mushroom. It can be an ingredient, or you can eat it.

item.name: porcini
item.description: You see a porcini. It can be an ingredient, or you can eat it.

item.name: spinach
item.description: You see spinach. It is enriched with vitamins.

item.name: courgette
item.description: You see a courgette. It can be an ingredient, or you can eat it.

item.name: collard
item.description: You see a collard. It's rare and strangely magical.

item.name: onion
item.description: You see an onion.

item.name: cauliflower
item.description: You see a fresh head of cauliflower.

item.name: broccoli
item.description: You see a bunch of broccoli.

item.name: leek
item.description: You see a leek.

item.name: perch
item.description: You see a perch.

item.name: mackerel
item.description: You see a mackerel.

item.name: roach
item.description: You see a roach.

item.name: char
item.description: You see a char.

item.name: clownfish
item.description: You see a clownfish

item.name: surgeonfish
item.description: You see a surgeonfish.

item.name: egg
item.description: You see an egg.

item.name: meat
item.description: You see a piece of meat.

item.name: trout
item.description: You see a trout.

item.name: cod
item.description: You see a cod.

item.name: ham
item.description: You see a juicy ham.

item.name: toadstool
item.description: You see a toadstool. Beware!

item.name: sandwich
item.description: You see a ham and cheese sandwich.

item.name: pie
item.description: You see a meat and vegetable pie.

item.name: easter_egg
item.description: You see a lovely chocolate easter egg.

item.name: leather_helmet
item.description: You see a leather helmet, it seems more like a hat than a defensive item.

item.name: robins_hat
item.description: You see a robins hat. It's cute but that's about it.

item.name: studded_helmet
item.description: You see a studded helmet, it should protect your head against cuts but perhaps not hard blows.

item.name: chain_helmet
item.description: You see a solid chain helmet, it will be excellent protection for your head.

item.name: viking_helmet
item.description: You see a viking helmet. The previous owner wore it to many battles.

item.name: aventail
item.description: You see a aventail. It's a clever design.

item.name: golden_helmet
item.description: You see a heavy golden helmet. The thick metal should protect you against almost anything.

item.name: shadow_helmet
item.description: You see a heavy shadow helmet. Instead of shining, it darkly gleams.

item.name: horned_golden_helmet
item.description: You see a horned golden helmet.

item.name: chaos_helmet
item.description: You see a chaos helmet.

item.name: magic_chain_helmet
item.description: You see a magic chain helmet.

item.name: black_helmet
item.description: You see a black helmet.

item.name: arandula
item.description: You see a arandula. It has medicinal properties, if the right person uses it.

item.name: kokuda
item.description: You see a kokuda. It has medicinal properties, if the right person uses it.

item.name: emerald
item.description: You see an emerald, a precious gemstone.

item.name: sapphire
item.description: You see a sapphire, a precious gemstone.

item.name: carbuncle
item.description: You see a carbuncle, a precious gemstone related to the garnet.

item.name: obsidian
item.description: You see a piece of obsidian, it's known as volcanic glass because it forms when lava cools rapidly. When used as a gemstone it may look jet black or silvery grey, depending on how it is cut.

item.name: dungeon_silver_key
item.description: You see a silver dungeon key. Use it only if you are brave.

item.name: lich_gold_key
item.description: You see a golden lich key. It will open the door to terrible things.

item.name: minotaur_key
item.description: You see a fancy bronze key.

item.name: nalwor_bank_key
item.description: You see a key to the customer room of Nalwor Bank.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_001
item.description: You see a key to room #001 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_002
item.description: You see a key to room #002 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_003
item.description: You see a key to room #003 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_004
item.description: You see a key to room #004 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_005
item.description: You see a key to room #005 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_006
item.description: You see a key to room #006 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_007
item.description: You see a key to room #007 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_008
item.description: You see a key to room #008 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: small_key
item.description: You see the key for Zara's row house in Ados.

item.name: leather_legs
item.description: You see a pair of leather legs. They look new but they're poor quality.

item.name: studded_legs
item.description: You see a pair of blood stained studded legs. You're not sure if the blood came from their last owner ... or his enemies.

item.name: chain_legs
item.description: You see a pair of well made chain legs. They should protect you against any attacks aimed low.

item.name: elvish_legs
item.description: You see a pair of elvish legs.

item.name: golden_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shining, strong golden legs.

item.name: shadow_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shadow legs. The weight of them is incredible.

item.name: chaos_legs
item.description: You see a pair of chaos legs.

item.name: black_legs
item.description: You see a pair of black legs.

item.name: giant_heart
item.description: You see a giant heart. This proves that a giant was defeated, and has magical properties that you are not sure of.

item.name: pizza
item.description: You see a tasty pizza, and hope they put extra cheese on it.

item.name: token
item.description: You see a token, that when placed in the right spot could point you in the right direction.

item.name: note
item.description: You see a note.

item.name: coupon
item.description: You see a coupon.

item.name: dice
item.description: You see a set of dice. May lady luck be with you.

item.name: cards
item.description: You see a deck of cards. Shuffle them well, to get a winning hand.

item.name: teddy
item.description: You see a teddy bear. Its soft and cuddly, and children love them.

item.name: skull_ring
item.description: You see a skull ring.

item.name: vampirette_entrails
item.description: You see some vampirette entrails. These guts proves that a vampirette was slain.

item.name: bat_entrails
item.description: You see some bat entrails, full of the blood of a living creature.

item.name: dart
item.description: You see a dart.

item.name: power_dart
item.description: You see a power dart.

item.name: shuriken
item.description: You see a shuriken.

item.name: wooden_spear
item.description: You see a wooden spear. With that primitive but powerful weapon you can fight from a distance.

item.name: wooden_bow
item.description: You see a wooden bow. With this in one hand, and wooden arrows in the other, you may be able to attack from a distance.

item.name: longbow
item.description: You see a longbow. Equipped with this, and a supply of arrows, you will have an effective ranged attack.

item.name: composite_bow
item.description: You see a composite bow. It's better strung than most bows, for excellent ranged attack.

item.name: wood
item.description: You see some wood, fallen from a nearby tree.

item.name: grain
item.description: You see a sheaf of grain.

item.name: wool
item.description: You see wool. It was recently shorn.

item.name: yarn
item.description: You see a ball of yarn. It was spun with care.

item.name: cloth
item.description: You see a roll of cloth. It is of first-class quality.

item.name: gold_nugget
item.description: You see a gold nugget. Its rich golden colour shines, and it may be useful.

item.name: gold_bar
item.description: You see a gold bar. It will make beautiful jewellery, or fetch a fine price.

item.name: golden_egg
item.description: You see a valuable golden egg.

item.name: spotted_egg
item.description: You see a spotted egg. You don't know what it is for.

item.name: dragon_egg
item.description: You see a valuable dragon egg.

item.name: engagement_ring
item.description: You see a diamond engagement ring, a symbol of love (or a symbol of wealth?)

item.name: emerald_ring
item.description: You see ring of life. Wear it, and you risk less from death.

item.name: nalwor_city_scroll
item.description: You see a nalwor city scroll, it will take you back to nalwor city.

item.name: ados_city_scroll
item.description: You see a ados city scroll, it will take you back to ados city.

item.name: fado_city_scroll
item.description: You see a fado city scroll, it will take you back to fado city.

item.name: home_scroll
item.description: You see a home scroll, it will take you back to semos city.

item.name: empty_scroll
item.description: You see an empty scroll. If used correctly it will return you to where you marked it at.

item.name: buckler
item.description: You see a small buckler. It may protect you against swords and maces but against stronger weapons you do not trust it.

item.name: wooden_shield
item.description: You see a wooden shield. It is made of cheap wood and heavily used. However, it still seems to offer you some kind of basic protection.

item.name: studded_shield
item.description: You see a studded shield. It's a little dented but seems robust enough.

item.name: plate_shield
item.description: You see a solid plate shield. It is in good condition, and might be worth a little.

item.name: lion_shield
item.description: You see a valuable lion shield. It is heavy enough to defend you against strong attacks.

item.name: unicorn_shield
item.description: You see a unicorn shield. It's beautifully crafted and will give you excellent protection.

item.name: enhanced_lion_shield
item.description: An enhanced lion shield glints at you. It will defend you well.

item.name: skull_shield
item.description: The face of a skull scowls at you from this fearsome skull shield.

item.name: crown_shield
item.description: You see a mighty crown shield. It is in perfect condition.

item.name: elvish_shield
item.description: You see an elvish shield made of tree leaves.

item.name: green_dragon_shield
item.description: You see an green dragon shield, scaly and strong.

item.name: golden_shield
item.description: You see a golden shield, could it be the ultimate in defence?

item.name: shadow_shield
item.description: You see a shadow shield. Rather than reflecting light, it seems to absorb it.

item.name: chaos_shield
item.description: You see a chaos shield. Its charming appearance will fool your enemies.

item.name: magic_plate_shield
item.description: You see a magic plate shield. Its has a magical quality surrounding it.

item.name: black_shield
item.description: You see a black shield. Its darkness will surely protect you.

item.name: assassin_dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you may be able to hurt something with it.

item.name: knife
item.description: You see a blunt knife which looks capable of little damage.

item.name: soul_dagger
item.description: You see a soul dagger. It's so light and sharp that you can stab at a very fast rate.

item.name: dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you can jab pretty fast with it.

item.name: dark_dagger
item.description: You see a dark dagger. It's designed to be used with a fast motion.

item.name: short_sword
item.description: You see a well kept short sword which will be easy to carry as you travel.

item.name: r_hand_sword
item.description: You see r hand sword. It must be used with a left hand sword.

item.name: l_hand_sword
item.description: You see l hand sword. It must be used with right hand sword.

item.name: sword
item.description: You see a sharp sword which might even be worth a little.

item.name: scimitar
item.description: This scimitar catches the light as you look at it, it will be a powerful weapon.

item.name: katana
item.description: You see a valuable katana, with a lethal looking blade.

item.name: orc_sword
item.description: You see an orc sword which has a heavy and deadly appearance.

item.name: demon_sword
item.description: Demon skeletons return from hell with this demon sword.

item.name: vampire_sword
item.description: You see the vampire sword, which will suck life from those you attack with it.

item.name: claymore
item.description: This claymore is very hard to lift as it is so heavy. It will be a good weapon if you can swing it.

item.name: biting_sword
item.description: The point of this biting sword is chiseled to a lethal point. It will serve you well.

item.name: fire_sword
item.description: Flames race along this fire sword as you wield it.

item.name: ice_sword
item.description: You see an ice sword, the blade is lethally cold to the touch, and you know it is one of the best weapons you'll find.

item.name: chaos_sword
item.description: The chaos sword. It hurts them but it heals you.

item.name: broadsword
item.description: You see a mighty broadsword. Enemies will see their death.

item.name: golden_orc_sword
item.description: You see a golden orc sword, with its heavy and deadly appearance it seems also valuable.

item.name: elvish_sword
item.description: This an elvish sword. It looks like it is made from tree leaves!

item.name: drow_sword
item.description: This is a genuine drow sword.

item.name: great_sword
item.description: This rare great sword is heavy and of good craftsmanship. It can only attack incredibly slowly.

item.name: orcish_sword
item.description: This orcish sword is badly done and weighs a lot.

item.name: immortal_sword
item.description: This immortal sword is a gift of gods to the chosen one. It is heavy and of exquisite craftsmanship.

item.name: black_sword
item.description: You see a black sword. Its darkness will surely protect you.

item.name: demon_fire_sword
item.description: The demon fire sword, a horrible sword taken from hell's deepest dungeons.

item.name: gold_pan
item.description: You see a gold pan. It is the traditional tool to prospect for gold.

item.name: fishing_rod
item.description: You see a fishing rod. If you find a fishing spot you can catch fish with it.
